title: I Pitches
stimulusHtml:
16 points

Pitches (16 points)

  • Award 1 point for each correctly notated pitch. Do not consider duration.

  • Award full credit for octave transpositions of the correct bass pitch.

title: II Chord Symbols
stimulusHtml:
Chord Symbols (8 points)

  • Award 1 point for each chord symbol correct in both Roman and Arabic numerals.

  • Award 1/2 point for each correct Roman numeral that has an incorrect or missing Arabic numeral.

  • Accept the correct Roman numeral regardless of its case.

  • The cadential six-four may be correctly notated in two different ways as shown in the key above. If the Roman numeral of the antepenultimate chord is V, the space below the penultimate chord should contain a figure, be blank or contain a dash, or contain a V in order for the antepenultimate chord to receive any credit.

title: III Special Scoring Issues
stimulusHtml:
Round any fractional score up to the next higher point (Exception: round 23 1/2 Down)

0 Score for responses that represent an unsuccessful attempt to answer the question.

_ Score for blank or irrelevant papers.
descriptions:
Round any fractional score up to the next higher point (Exception: round 23 1/2 Down)

0 Score for responses that represent an unsuccessful attempt to answer the question.

_ Score for blank or irrelevant papers.
